name: TI_2_1_4_1_Clinical_Alerts_Clinical_Audit_Trigger
title: TI.2.1.4.1 Clinical Alerts Clinical Audit Trigger (Function)
description: Manage Audit Trigger initiated to track clinical alerts.
purpose: Capture clinical alerts, both routine and exceptional, including key metadata (who, what, when, where, why).

statement.label: TI.2.1.4.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence of a clinical alert according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.

statement.label: TI.2.1.4.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization.

statement.label: TI.2.1.4.1#03
statement.requirement: IF known, THEN the system SHALL capture identity of the user.

statement.label: TI.2.1.4.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system.

statement.label: TI.2.1.4.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.4.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time of the event initiating audit trigger.

statement.label: TI.2.1.4.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the location (i.e., network address).

statement.label: TI.2.1.4.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the rationale for the clinical alert.
